verses.text: Who hath believed our report? And to whom is the arm of the \sc Lord\sc* revealed?

For he shall grow up before him as a tender plant, And as a root out of a dry ground: He hath no form nor comeliness; And when we shall see him, \add there is\add* no beauty that we should desire him.
He is despised and rejected of men; A man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief: And we hid as it were \add our\add* faces from him; He was despised, and we esteemed him not.
Surely he hath borne our griefs, And carried our sorrows: Yet we did esteem him stricken, Smitten of God, and afflicted.
But he \add was\add* wounded for our transgressions, \add He was\add* bruised for our iniquities: The chastisement of our peace \add was\add* upon him; And with his stripes we are healed.
All we like sheep have gone astray; We have turned every one to his own way; And the \sc Lord\sc* hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.
He was oppressed, and he was afflicted, Yet he opened not his mouth: He is brought as a lamb to the slaughter, And as a sheep before her shearers is dumb, So he openeth not his mouth.
He was taken from prison and from judgment: And who shall declare his generation? For he was cut off out of the land of the living: For the transgression of my people was he stricken.
And he made his grave with the wicked, And with the rich in his death; Because he had done no violence, Neither \add was any\add* deceit in his mouth.

Yet it pleased the \sc Lord\sc* to bruise him; he hath put \add him\add* to grief: When thou shalt make his soul an offering for sin, He shall see \add his\add* seed, he shall prolong \add his\add* days, And the pleasure of the \sc Lord\sc* shall prosper in his hand.
He shall see of the travail of his soul, \add and\add* shall be satisfied: By his knowledge shall my righteous servant justify many; For he shall bear their iniquities.

Therefore will I divide him \add a portion\add* with the great, And he shall divide the spoil with the strong; Because he hath poured out his soul unto death: And he was numbered with the transgressors; And he bare the sin of many, And made intercession for the transgressors.
